mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ord (ord_num, id, total_item_qty, total_price, total_dlv_price, total_disc_price, total_pay_price, ord_date, ord_state, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id) VALUES (#{ord_num}, #{id}, #{total_item_qty}, #{total_price}, #{total_dlv_price}, #{total_disc_price}, #{total_pay_price}, now(), #{ord_state}, now(), #{id}, now(), #{id})
